title: Hot, Decadent Rising
description: Eli has met his match in Kara, a woman as passionate as sin and as hot as Hell’s rampant flames. He agrees to share one night of carnal bliss with her, but he doesn't plan to walk away in the morning. It won’t be a problem. She’s bound to want more after sampling what he has to offer. The only problem he foresees will be keeping her, a woman hell-bent on dying to get revenge, alive.
author: Candice Stauffer
